tier.item: Omar ma s g inyeme le s yy giaa y l .
O 1sg-SUBJ word the LOG with speak said came
`Omari came in order for me to talk with himi about the problem'

kandow nyan g t-go n yu
[just fire [granary] burn.PST.3sg]-the in millet much was
`In the granary that the fire just burnt, there was a lot of millet.
